verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:1
verses.text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels, and have not charity, I am become as sounding brass, or a tinkling cymbal.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:2
verses.text: And though I have the gift of prophecy, and understand all mysteries, and all knowledge; and though I have all faith, so that I could remove mountains, and have not charity, I am nothing.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:3
verses.text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor, and though I give my body to be burned, and have not charity, it profiteth me nothing.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:4
verses.text: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up,

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:5
verses.text: Doth not behave itself unseemly, seeketh not her own, is not easily provoked, thinketh no evil;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:6
verses.text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity, but rejoiceth in the truth;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:7
verses.text: Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:8
verses.text: Charity never faileth: but whether there be prophecies, they shall fail; whether there be tongues, they shall cease; whether there be knowledge, it shall vanish away.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:9
verses.text: For we know in part, and we prophesy in part.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:10
verses.text: But when that which is perfect is come, then that which is in part shall be done away.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:11
verses.text: When I was a child, I spake as a child, I understood as a child, I thought as a child: but when I became a man, I put away childish things.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:12
verses.text: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:13
verses.text: And now abideth faith, hope, charity, these three; but the greatest of these is charity.
